name: PongShot
description:
PongShot is a remake of the classic Pong game with the addition of laser shooting to break the opponent's barriers to score a goal... or you can choose the classic mode!

You can play against a friend (always recommended) or against the computer in both normal and classic mode.

WebGL Controls:

Player 1: "W", "S", "Left Control" / Gamepad
Player 2: "Up", "Down", "Right Control"
Pause game: "P"

WINDOWS STANDALONE VERSION


I recommend you to download the Standalone version for Windows which has:

  • Better performance
  • 4 Different skins
  • Fullscreen mode

Standalone Controls:

Player 1: "W", "S", "Left Control" / Gamepad

Player 2: "Up", "Down", "Right Control"

Pause game: "P" or "ESC"


Feel free to comment and report bugs
in the comments section!

Code, graphics and audio made by me.

Made with Unity.
